name: Lenzing AG
goal:
Lenzing is a performance materials company that turns CO2 and sunlight into higly functional, emotional and aesthetic products across the globe.
We, as the leaders in fiber innovation, produce all three generations of Cellulosic fibers -Lenzing Viscose(R), Lenzing Modal(R) and TENCEL(R) branded Lyocell fibers - exactly specified for the need of our customers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives:
+Retaliation of US with 100% duty due to EU Hormon Beef import restrictions
+MES-Status China
+FTA negotiations
+Modernisation of Trade Defence Instruments
+Trade for All
+European Emission Trading Scheme,
+REACH,
+R&D-BREFs,
+Ecolabel,
